The Bored Puppets Yacht Club

A limited NFT collection where the token itself doubles as your membership to a swamp club for puppets. The club is open! Ape in with us.

Mint on GLMR Mint on MOVR Mint on EVMOS

BPYC Supported Chains

BPYC is a collection of 9,999 Bored Puppets NFTs—unique digital collectibles living across all EVM blockchains.

Moonbeam

You can Mint your Puppet for only 1 GLMR

Mint on GLMR

Moonriver

You can Mint your Puppet for only 0,1 MOVR

Mint on MOVR

Evmos

You can Mint your Puppet for only 10 EVMOS

Mint on EVMOS

Awesome Features

Rarity

Each Bored Puppet is unique and programmatically generated, including expression, headwear, clothing, and more. All puppets are dope, but some are rarer than others.

Decentralization

The Puppets are stored as ERC-721 tokens on differents EVM blockchains and hosted on IPFS.

Multichain Rarity

since all the puppets are different from each other, those that will be deployed on one chain will not be available in another.

Our Community is growing fast
